GK19gp23-33u:1598: mitho mithunam uttaraṃ viraham ūhamānaṃ mithaḥ

GK19gp23-33u:2432: vrajaga-prajā diśi diśi drāk kāndiśīkyaṃ gatāḥ ||JGc_1,31.1|| kiṃcit kiṃcin mūtraṇād āpagānāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2440: tadākhilaṃ gokulam āśu mṛdbhiḥ pracchannam āsīd vana-maṇḍalaṃ ca ||JGc_1,31.4|| yatra tatra
GK19gp23-33u:2441: ādadhāti sa kṣmāpi tatra valate vidīrṇatām |
GK19gp23-33u:2442: netra-tulya-vilataḥ samucchritaṃ vāri rodana-nibhaṃ bibharti ca ||JGc_1,31.5|| [9] tatra lokānāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2443: jātu mātu girireṣa samantād- uccalann api tathāvidha-mūrteḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2446: [10] evam udghnatā gavām udghnān nighnatā ca sarvaṃ vastu prastubhyatā
GK19gp23-33u:2447: cāriṣṭena kṛtād ākruṣṭāt kaṣṭam anuspṛṣṭavantas te goṣṭha-niṣṭhā
GK19gp23-33u:2449: [11] sūrataḥ sa tu dūratas teṣām avagata-vikrośana-leśa-mātraṃ kutrāpy
GK19gp23-33u:2451: avasthāya ca mā bhaiṣṭety abhayam uddiṣṭaṃ vidhāya krodhāviṣṭas tam ariṣṭam ājuhāva
GK19gp23-33u:2453: tad idaṃ tu taṃ prati samprati sukarārdanas tvam asīti jñāpanāya |
GK19gp23-33u:2455: sapālaiḥ paśubhir manda trāsitaiḥ kim asattama |
GK19gp23-33u:2459: piṇḍīśūra vidūraḥ san krūratāṃ tvaṃ kim ṛcchasi |
GK19gp23-33u:2460: sāmudra-pūra iva māṃ kumbha-jātaṃ prapūrayeti ||JGc_1,31.7||[13] tad idaṃ ca tasya gāṃ-manyasya
GK19gp23-33u:2461: jighāṃsayā lokānāṃ gotva-bhramāpagamanayā coktavān iti gamyate |
GK19gp23-33u:2463: āsphoṭanaṃ kṛtam anena tadā yad asmād- āsphoṭanaṃ samabhavad danuja-śrutīnām |
GK19gp23-33u:2464: ko' yaṃ cakāra sa tu yad vṛsabhas tad uccaiḥ kopaṃ ca varṣa-śiśuvan nahi jāhasīti ||JGc_1,31.8|| kṛṣṇaḥ sakhyuḥ skandha-deśe sva-bāhuṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2467: preyo-vargāṇāṃ ca sandeha-sargam ||JGc_1,31.9|| vṛṣas tv asau raja iva puccha-mārjanī- paribhramair ghana-gaṇa-lakṣam utkṣipan |
GK19gp23-33u:2468: kṣitiṃ kṣatām atha khura-vajra-vijvalat- khanitrakair vidadhad agād dhariṃ prati ||JGc_1,31_10|| sa vajrati sma na param āśu vidravaṃ prati dviṣat-pratirutatī-vratāṃ prati |
GK19gp23-33u:2469: na kevalaṃ harir iha hā samāyayau sakhāpi yaḥ parikṛta-tad-bhujāṃsakaḥ ||JGc_1,31.11||[14] tādṛśatayā spaṣṭam aviprakṛṣṭe ca tasmin śrīmān kṛṣṇas tu śṛṅga-dvayam evābhijagrāha,
GK19gp23-33u:2471: śṛṅge ye pūrvatāṃ nīte jayāya vṛṣa-rakṣasā |
GK19gp23-33u:2472: sva-sandānāya te sṛṣṭe kṛṣṇa-doṣṇor vaśaṃ gate ||JGc_1,31.12||
GK19gp23-33u:2475: pratyag aṣṭādaśa ca kramān balād dity-apatya-ripuṇāpayāpitaḥ ||JGc_1,31.13|| ayam uddhutas tad iha nāsti bhāratā na phalaṃ vinodana-kalā-vinodataḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2476: iti mādhavaḥ sphuṭam ariṣṭam utkṣipan nati-rīḍhayā bata vivṛttim āṭiṭat ||JGc_1,31.14|| vyavartata hari-kṣiptaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:2478: hāsāveśa-vaśe kṣiptaḥ svarge' pi svargiṇāṃ gaṇaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:2479: ||JGc_1,31_15|| papāta pucchaṃ bhuvi śṛṅgayor balāc chṛṅge tu pucchasya nipetatur bhuvi
GK19gp23-33u:2481: tadā yuktaṃ tad asmin viparīta-kāriṇi ||JGc_1,31.16|| tajjā lajjāpy utthitā
GK19gp23-33u:2482: tasya so' pi pratyuttasthāv abhyayuṅktāpi bhūyaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2484: ṇotkṛttenāmuṣya vaktraṃ cukuṭṭa ||JGc_1,31.17||[14] śṛṅgotpāṭaṇaṃ ghaṭayaṃs tv idam ācaṣṭa-
GK19gp23-33u:2487: bhadrākṛtir eva praśasyate ||JGc_1,31.18|| athārdra-vasanaṃ yathā parinipīḍayan jīvanaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2488: vikarṣati janas tathā tam akarod ariṣṭaṃ hariḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2491: asyau parama-śuddhatām api jagāma kaivalyataḥ ||JGc_1,31.19|| layaṃ paramam āgatas tad api yat padaṃ nairṛtaṃ yayāvayam iti smṛtaṃ munibhir etad uccai ruṣā |
GK19gp23-33u:2492: prasūnam atha yan mudā vavṛṣur āditeyās tad apy amitra-vilayād bhaved ucitam īdṛśāt kiṃ punaḥ ||JGc_1,31.20||
GK19gp23-33u:2493: [15] atra ca śrī-gokula-prāṇābhiprāyam abhiprayadbhis tad eva
GK19gp23-33u:2495: vatsaṃ laghuṃ daityatayāvagacchan jaghāna bāle' py aham ukṣa daitya |
GK19gp23-33u:2498: [16] atra gokula-janasya gokula-jīvanasya ca bhāvam āviśann eva
GK19gp23-33u:2501: viveśa goṣṭhaṃ sabalo gopīnāṃ nayanotsavaḥ ||[BhP 10.36.15] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:2503: sarve' py unmadatāṃ gatā bahu-vidhaṃ saṃvādam unnirmamuḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2504: kiṃ tu drāk pitarāv amuṣya vadanaṃ tad vīkṣyamāṇāv amū svair bāṣpāmbubhir āplutaṃ mamṛjatur vikruśya mūkāv iva ||JGc_1,31.22||
GK19gp23-33u:2506: ayaṃ sa stava-bhāk sūnus tava gopa-narādhipa |
GK19gp23-33u:2508: [18] atha rātri-kathāyām api snigdhakaṇṭha evābhidadhe-[19] evaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2510: akṣīṇānaṅgānāṃ vṛtta-kṛṣṇa-saṅgānāṃ bahudhā nivṛttaṃ rātri-vṛttaṃ svayam eva sakhībhir anusandhīyatām
GK19gp23-33u:2513: sa tathā saha gopībhī rarāma madhusūdanaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2516: gopyaḥ kṛṣṇe vanaṃ yāte tam anudruta-cetasaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2517: kṛṣṇa-līlāḥ pragāyantyo ninyur duḥkhena vāsarān ||[BhP 10.35.1] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:2518: [22] tathā hi-yadā khalv aharahaḥ kṣayam āsādya vādya-gīta-nṛtyaṃ vivṛtya
GK19gp23-33u:2519: sahacara-saṅginībhiḥ śṛṅgiṇībhiḥ saha sa harir vraja-jana-sneha-dhanaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:2520: sva-veśma praviśati tadā vigata-parimāṇā vimānānucāriṇaḥ sarva eva samam
GK19gp23-33u:2521: upary-upari-cariṇaḥ saha gaṇena kaṇehatya spaṣṭaṃ draṣṭum icchantas
GK19gp23-33u:2524: tu tasmin vismaya-sthagitatayā sa-lālasatayā ca tatra tatra citrāyamāṇā rātriṃ gamayanti sma
GK19gp23-33u:2525: [23] śaraṇāntarāt punar yāvan niḥsarati sa eṣa śaraṇāgatāyāgatānusaraṇaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2526: tad evaṃ yadā niḥsarati niḥsṛtya ca gopa-gogaṇa-sañcaraṇāya veṇuṃ raṇayati |
GK19gp23-33u:2527: tadātanaṃ caritaṃ gocaratām aticarad api nija-bhāva-prabhāva-sampadā
GK19gp23-33u:2528: cakṣuṣīva racitaṃ vidhāya śrīmad-ābhīra-bhīrubhir abhigītam, yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:2530: virahi-janānāṃ janayati hṛdayam vidayatayā bata kṛttam |
GK19gp23-33u:2536: tataś ca muhur api tāvan mātre tāsāṃ gāna-pātre sati vana-vrajayor madhyam adhyāsya harṣaṃ tarṣaṃ ca dhāsyan vaṃśaṃ śaṃsayati sma |
GK19gp23-33u:2538: citraṃ lakṣmī-rekhāsau hṛdi capalā na bhavati capalā |
GK19gp23-33u:2540: anu tārāvalir api sā rājāti taralā ||yasya sa cāyaṃ veṇu-kalāmṛta-varṣī
GK19gp23-33u:2545: [27] taṃ gatvā ca satvara-prathama-payaḥ-pāyanāya gaṅgā-yamunādi-nāmnā gāḥ
GK19gp23-33u:2546: su-vikasvara-sarasijaṃ saraḥ prati kramād veṇu-gānataḥ samākārayati tasmin vraja-ramānāthe buddha-nijākāraṇa iva ruddha-pravāha-prasaratayāsthiratām
GK19gp23-33u:2552: sarid-ālī labhate tatra viśeṣam ||kamita-bhaṅga-bhujā kila tat-pada-raja
GK19gp23-33u:2554: laghu sukṛtāsmād dṛg iva spṛhayati vidatī svam anabhinītam ||JGc_1,31.26||[28] atha tadā tadāhūti-kṛtām
GK19gp23-33u:2555: ārabhya tac-caritam upalabhya kadācid vraja-dharitrīśitrī-sadasi gatabhiḥ kābhiścana tābhir utkaṇṭhayā suṣṭhu pratuṣṭuṣamāṇābhir api nija-bhāvaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2556: pidhāya bhāvāntara-sādhāraṇyaṃ vidhāya tad idaṃ varṇanaṃ tan-nirvarṇanam
GK19gp23-33u:2560: anucara-varṇita-vīrya-samunnatir ayam udayati vanamālī ||dhru|| sa gavākāraṇa-muralī-kalam anu tanute yatra
GK19gp23-33u:2564: api śākhā-tatibhir yat kila kalayati śātam ||JGc_1,31.27||[30] tad evam aniṅgānām apīṅgānām iva śaśvad iṅga-vyaṅgaṃ vihitavān |
GK19gp23-33u:2565: [31] atha samāsanne vinodenāhnāyavan madhyāhne kvacin mahā-sarasi
GK19gp23-33u:2567: kevala-tilaka-vanamālā-valita-veśa-bhaṅgi-saṅgitā-pūrvakam apūrve tasminn ekānte kusumita-vanānte kānte mahā-śaila-prānte
GK19gp23-33u:2571: tad-anusāri-veṇu-cāri-raṇitena suracita-sārasādi-rasādhānaḥ so' yaṃ ramate sma |
GK19gp23-33u:2576: parito nyaviśata tām āviśatī rutim iha yā hari-gītā ||JGc_1,31.28||[33] tataś ca tatas tataḥ samāgate sāgraje samagre sakhi-varge
GK19gp23-33u:2585: [35] yac ca vādyam udbhavat-puru-guru-garima-giri-droṇīḥ pratidhavan yat tat paramparayā ca sarvam api tatha raṇayat-trilokī-lokam api
GK19gp23-33u:2587: [36] tatha ca sati tat tad anubhūya bhūyaś ca tābhir idaṃ tasyām eva
GK19gp23-33u:2595: ambu-dharaḥ sphuṭam upagantā na ca kiṃ tu chatram ivāste ||JGc_1,31.29||[37] tataś ca tatrātighane ghana-cchāye vihāraṃ vicchāyati sma |
GK19gp23-33u:2596: [38] tad etac ca vrajarāja-jāyā-samājam anu sādhāraṇa-sampradhāraṇatayā
GK19gp23-33u:2601: [39] tad-anantaraṃ ca prāyaśaḥ kāścid vraja-devīr vrajād ahni cāpahnuty
GK19gp23-33u:2602: vyājaṃ vyajya vā tad-āgamana-vartmani tad-anuvartanāya vartamānās taṃ paśyantīḥ punar apaśyantīr iva dūrāt pariharantīr itthaṃ kāścid dūtikāḥ
GK19gp23-33u:2604: madāndhe rājate piñchī na sapiñchī puras tava |
GK19gp23-33u:2606: sa jagat-prāṇa eṣa neti ||JGc_1,31.31||[40] śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ ca chalena vijñāpayanti, yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:2607: jyotsnāṃ tanoti lalitāṃ dadhate vicitrāṃ śākhāṃ dadhāti nikhilaṃ jayatīti-bhāṅgyā |
GK19gp23-33u:2608_0: candrāvalīṃ ca lalitāṃ ca viśākhikāṃ ca rādhāṃ ca tāḥ sakhi-sadasy api sūcayanti ||JGc_1,31.32 ||[41]
GK19gp23-33u:2608_1: tatra kāścid deva-pūjā-vvyājena duṣprāpa-puṣpādikam avacinvānā bahala-kalaha-mūlatāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2610: [42] kāścit tu navya-bhavya-gavyādikaṃ tad-artham evānayanti tathāpi nātmanā tasminn arpayanti
GK19gp23-33u:2611: tata eva kṛtrima-dāna-catvara-deśam apadeśam avarudhya vartma vinirudhya pṛcchantaṃ taṃ prati
GK19gp23-33u:2613_0: divyād api divyam etad vijñāya yajña-patnīr anu kṛta-yatnāsu krayikatām āśrayamāṇāsu
GK19gp23-33u:2613_1: yajña-bhuk-pati-vratāsu satyākṛti-kṛtinīvāka-parīpākam ākalayya kṛtsnaṃ vasnaṃ ca
GK19gp23-33u:2614: [43] tatra puṣpāvacaye praṇayinā saha vākovākyam, yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:2615: kā yūyaṃ vana-devatāḥ kurutha kiṃ puṣpāṇi saṃcinmahe kiṃ nirmāsyatha devatārcanam ato yūyaṃ kathaṃ devatāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2616: tac ca krīḍanam eva naḥ sphuṭam abhūd asmābhir īdṛg-vidhair
GK19gp23-33u:2617: aikātmyaṃ va iti prasahya viharan hārī hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||JGc_1,31.33||[44]
GK19gp23-33u:2619: kā yūyaṃ vana-devatāḥ kurutha kiṃ puṣpāṇi gṛhṇīmahe rājyaṃ nas tridaśair vihāpitam idaṃ devyo vanasyātra kāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:2621: arpitaṃ yadi tadāpy asmākam uccaiḥ sthitiḥ syād evaṃ sa-vivādam aṅgaja-raṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya tābhir babhau ||JGc_1,31.34||
GK19gp23-33u:2622: [45] kadācic ca kasyāścid dūtyā saha kṛṣṇasya vākovākyam-
GK19gp23-33u:2623: iyaṃ kā strī strītvaṃ bhavati katham īṣat-padam idaṃ kim asthāne siddhaṃ tava vacanam asthānakam idam |
GK19gp23-33u:2624: na kākor udbhūtaṃ bhavati tad aho kākūr iha kā tad evaṃ dūtī-vāg jayati hariṇākṣyā harim anu ||JGc_1,31.35|| [46] atha
GK19gp23-33u:2626: kā yūyaṃ kila gavya-vikrayikikā lakṣmīm atītya sthitiṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2627: prāptānāṃ na tad asti sambhava-padaṃ yuṣmākam āsāṃ kvacit |
GK19gp23-33u:2628: mūlyaṃ tām atipatya tasya viditaṃ tasmān na tad-dūṣaṇaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2629: dānaṃ tarhi mamāpi tadvadam idaṃ dattātha ghaṭṭeśituḥ ||JGc_1,31.36|| [47]
GK19gp23-33u:2631: gṛhṇīdhvaṃ pūrvam āsāṃ phalam atula-balād ghaṭṭa-caryā-vighaṭṭaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2632: kartrīṇāṃ tasya cāste vitanuta parito rodanaṃ bodhanaṃ ca |
GK19gp23-33u:2633: budhyeran yady amūr na sphuṭataram aṭavīkārayā dhārayiṣyāmy etāḥ kiṃ vā hariṣye svayam atha pihitāḥ samyag anviṣya nīvīḥ
GK19gp23-33u:2634: ||JGc_1,31.37||[48] tad evam uditvā muditvā ca tat tad ācaritavati tasmin
GK19gp23-33u:2635: kathaṃcid gṛham āgatya gaty-antareṇa sakhīṣu tat-prakhyāpayantībhir idam api gītam-
GK19gp23-33u:2638: gajagati viharati gāyati nṛtyati vādayate ca sa vaṃśam |
GK19gp23-33u:2640: āvṛṇute' pi ca nāthati ghaṭṭagam aṃśam ||JGc_1,31.38||[49] tad evaṃ naukayā ramaṇam apy avagamanīyam |
GK19gp23-33u:2643: vihāra-caryayā tam upasadya ca parihāsataḥ parataś caraṇa-caryām ācaranti
GK19gp23-33u:2645_1: sphuṭam arjyamāna-sukhatayā madhye tāsāṃ vāmatā-yujāṃ mohanāya kūla-mud-rujāṃ durdhyāna-kāraṇāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2649: mahā-taraṇiṃ saraṇim anu sakhibhir akhila-maṇiḥ praṇīya karṇa-dhārāyamāṇas
GK19gp23-33u:2653: saritaṃ nāvaṃ racayati ca drutamasmākaṃ pathi tasyām |
GK19gp23-33u:2654: ārohayate pārayituṃ naḥ spṛśati miṣādapi yasyām ||JGc_1,31.39|| [50] tābhir evātra ślokitaṃ,
GK19gp23-33u:2656: ārohāya vidhāya saṃstaramilatparyakstavaṃ tadvacaḥ- sāhāyyaṃ viracayya naḥ
GK19gp23-33u:2658: vṛṇvan durvitaraṃ tadātarapaṇaṃ viṣkabhya naukāṃ na kāṃ cakre vakrakalākalāpakalanāṃ cakrāṅkapāṇiḥ sa tu
GK19gp23-33u:2661: tatraiva ca kutracana taṭinī-taṭe kadāpi yamunā-nikaṭe payaḥ-pāyanāya
GK19gp23-33u:2662: saṃkaṭitāṃ go-ghaṭāṃ ghaṭayan kramaśaś ca gaṇanayā gaṇaśaḥ prakaṭayaṃs
GK19gp23-33u:2670: [55] tataś cetas tataḥ sakhibhir akhilaiḥ praṇītānītāmanda-makaranda-sundara-kunda-dāmabhir mukundaḥ kṛtālaṅkṛtir yathā nijahāra |
GK19gp23-33u:2677: kalayata suhṛdāṃ dayayā yad asau nagam api dadhre suciram ||dhruvam|| kunda-srag-avita-kautuka-veśaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2690: [56] atha vaiṣṇavaṃ vārāham api purāṇam anusṛtya gaty-antaraṃ
GK19gp23-33u:2697: tad apasāraṇāya muralī-kalī-kalayā go-dhanālaya-govardhanācalayor antarāle tā evānanya-gatitayā saṃkalayya nirvṛtiṃ parikalayya ca
GK19gp23-33u:2699: āśāṃ dadamānaḥ sva-vrajataḥ pragarjad-ariṣṭa-kṛtāriṣṭa-kaṣṭataḥ prakaṭam ākruṣṭaṃ śrutavān
GK19gp23-33u:2700: śruta-mātre ca tatra nija-nija-vartmanā tābhiḥ saha sahasā vrajam āvavrāja |
GK19gp23-33u:2701: tad-anantaraṃ tu vṛttaṃ pūrvam eva vṛttam asti |

GK19gp23-33u:3501: guṇī na hari-tatparaḥ sarasa-dhīr naḥ kṛṣṇāśrayaḥ sa na vraja-ramānugaḥ sva-hṛdi sapta śalyāni me ||JGc_1,33.61||
GK19gp23-33u:3504: yataś ca na svānubhava evāyam anubhāvaś ca |
GK19gp23-33u:3507: [146] ṛṣir uvāca-tad evaṃ kāvya-śreṇīr iva nānā-deśa-veśa-bhāṣā-rasair
GK19gp23-33u:3508: eṇīdṛśaḥ pāṇaukṛtya pūrva-pūrvavad rāginīṃ madrādhipater api kanyāṃ sanyāyatayā varyāṃ bhāryā-varyāṃ kariṣyasi |
GK19gp23-33u:3509: na kevalā sā, tāsām adharāḥ ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-parimāṇāś cāparāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3510: [147] tatra madra-kanyāyāḥ pariṇaya-nyāyaṃ bhadram evaṃ varṇayiṣyanti-
GK19gp23-33u:3512: kanyāyā madrapātuḥ kṣitipati-niyutāsādhyam ekas tu paścāt |
GK19gp23-33u:3513: dūrād āgamya paścād api ca viluluve tāṃ harir yaḥ sa paścād bhūtvā tān yuktam ārdad yudhi tad api matāgrīyatā tasya citrā
GK19gp23-33u:3514: [148] kanyānāṃ ṣoḍaśa-sahasrāṇy uddiśya ca sahasra-vaktratām eva devatāḥ prāpsyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3517: tad-adhikam api taṃ tu śrī-harir manyate sma |
GK19gp23-33u:3518: naraka-haraṇa-nāmāpy atra yatnātiyatnaṃ yad akṛta yad ihāsīd vyagratā-biddha-buddhiḥ ||JGc_1,33.63||
GK19gp23-33u:3520: bhittvā durgāṇi kṛṣṇaḥ sasuta-mura-yutaṃ bhaumam unmukhya rājye
GK19gp23-33u:3523: pratyarpya kṣudra-vṛṣṇaḥ saha maṇi-giriṇāpy agrahīt pārijātam ||JGc_1,33.64||
GK19gp23-33u:3524: [151] tad evaṃ tava svargastha-vighna-hantṛtāṃ tatra ca vṛtraghnaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3526: tvām arcanti yadā svargyās tadā svargaḥ surālayaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3527: tvāṃ nārcanti yadā svargyās tadā svargaḥ surālayaḥ ||JGc_1,33.65||
GK19gp23-33u:3529: ajanāśam asau naṣṭo jīvanāśaṃ nanāśa ca |
GK19gp23-33u:3530: ūrdhva-śoṣaṃ sa cāśuṣyat kṛṣṇa yas tvat-parāṅmukhaḥ ||JGc_1,33.66||
GK19gp23-33u:3533: pratiśvastanaṃ sphurad-upacaye sati suta-sampattir api matim atītya
GK19gp23-33u:3535: kiṃ bahunā, bhavadvad-varṣa-ṣaṭkān anantaram eva yauvana-prapañcatas teṣām api prajātāḥ prajās tāvaty eva diṣṭe
GK19gp23-33u:3539: [155] tathā ca paurāṇī vāṇī-nātidīrgheṇa kālena sa kārṣṇī rūḍha-yauvanaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3541: tac ca kṛṣṇaṃ matvā striyo hrītāḥ [BhP 10.55.28]iti ca
GK19gp23-33u:3542: [156] tatra ca kaimutyam idam avadhira-mātraāṇām anavadhikam
GK19gp23-33u:3545: tatra pravayaso' py āsan yuvāno' tibalaujasaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3546: pibanto' kṣair mukundasya mukhāmbhoja-sudhāṃ muhuḥ || [BhP 10.45.19] iti
GK19gp23-33u:3547: [157] etena śrīmad-vraje tu tad-atiśayāt sphuṭam eva tad-atiśayaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3549: [158] kṛṣṇa uvāca-aho mahātman ! mahān ayam atyayaḥ sampraty api duratyayaṃ duḥkham arpayati
GK19gp23-33u:3552: [159] ṛṣir uvāca-śambareṇa janmata eva dyumnavat tava gṛhād apahṛtasya
GK19gp23-33u:3555: kṛṣṇe' pi dhṛṣṇag-bhavitātra kaḥ pumān yas tu svayaṃ yoddhum amuṃ vrajiṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3556: yad adya jātaṃ khalu tasya jātakaṃ hṛtvā tato mṛtyum avāpa śambaraḥ ||JGc_1,33.67||
GK19gp23-33u:3558: ūṣāṃ bāṇasya kanyāṃ rahasi gatam ananāniruddhaṃ niruddhaṃ yuddhe buddhā tam etaṃ drutam abhigatavān yudhyato' gryān nihatya |
GK19gp23-33u:3560: tat-pakṣaṃ nirjayaṃs tad-bhuja-balam alūnād yas tu tatrānyakaḥ kaḥ ||JGc_1,33.68||
GK19gp23-33u:3564: sā hi tavāhite manasi rāga-mayī jāgarūkatām eva parām āgamiṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3565: [163] hanta ! yat khalu nirantaram antargatam, tat katham antargatam iva jāyeta |
GK19gp23-33u:3568: [164] tadā ca kadācana rāmeṇa saha rahasya-vārtā tava vartiṣyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3570: sva-gamanam anālocya rāmaṃ śaśvad anuśocya vrajasthānāṃ smṛtitaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3571: pracyavamāna-bāṣpas tvayā ca tathānuśocatā procyamānas tava sandeśaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3573: prāpya ca sa yathā kathā-viṣayas tathā samasya varṇayiṣyati-
GK19gp23-33u:3574: vrajasthānāṃ rāmaḥ sva-sahaja-viyogārciṣi hareḥ purā satyaṃ jajñe punar iha tu jātaḥ sukha-kṛtī
GK19gp23-33u:3575: yatas teṣāṃ jvālāṃ sphurad amṛta-vācā praśamayaṃs tadīyāṃ sphūrtiṃ dṛg-viṣayam iva cakre sva-balataḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3577: tena tathā te nanditā yathā sarve' pi svayaṃ saparva-prāyatayā taṃ prārthayāmāsuḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3581: [167] śrīmān baladevaś ca yathāvad eva tathā valayāmāsa |
GK19gp23-33u:3582: valayitvā ca vrajaṃ prati pravalitānujāgamana-viśvāsaḥ sva-preyasīr ihaiva vihāya dvārakām api niścinta iva caliṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3583: āgatya ca dvārakāṃ tvām api sāntvayiṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3585: [168] kṛṣṇa uvāca-kiyān avaśeṣas tāvāṃś ca viśeṣaḥ kathyatām |
GK19gp23-33u:3587: tathā hi-vrajaṃ prati calitavati sakala-guṇa-tantre balabhadre puṇḍraka-maṇḍala-patiḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3590: vāsudevo' vatīrṇo' ham eka eva na cāparaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3591: bhūtānām anukampārthaṃ tvaṃ tu mithyābhidhāṃ tyaja ||[BhP 10.66.5] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3595: mitratām aśivatāṃ tathāsajann anyathā prathitavān sa tu tvayi ||JGc_1,33.70||
GK19gp23-33u:3596: vṛttāntenāmunā tu tvad-vṛttāntaḥ so' yam īkṣate |
GK19gp23-33u:3597: kṛtāntenācireṇa tvaṃ kṛtānta iva vartase ||JGc_1,33.71|| iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3599: [172] ṛṣir uvāca-tatas tad-vadhānantaraṃ tvaṃ tu taṃ tan-mitraṃ kāśīrājam api prāptanāśī-kariṣyasi
GK19gp23-33u:3604: tasmāt kaṣṭāyamānaḥ sann aṣṭim ucciar aṭiṣyati ||JGc_1,33.72||
GK19gp23-33u:3605: [173] atha rāmas tu dvividaṃ rāma-senāgrām agrāmaṇyaṃ vidann api haniṣyati
GK19gp23-33u:3607: āśritya rāmaṃ dvividaḥ svecchayā narakaṃ śritaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3608: iti tan-niṣkṛtiṃ kurvan rāmo' nyas tam adaṇḍayat ||JGc_1,33.73||
GK19gp23-33u:3612: kiṃ ca kṣauṇi-śaṭhā haṭād agharipos tejaḥ prasuptaṃ yaśasy udbuddhaṃ kila vardhituṃ tad iti te vārdhiṃ gatiṃ saṅgatāḥ ||JGc_1,33.74||
GK19gp23-33u:3614: vraja-sambandhibhiḥ samaṃ samanvayaḥ kiṃ na bhavitā ?
GK19gp23-33u:3616: yatas tad eva vṛttaṃ kramataḥ kramate sma |
GK19gp23-33u:3617: [177] tathā hi-yadā rāmas tīrtha-yātrāṃ kariṣyati, yasyāś cānte bhīṣmādi-śāntatā-prānte duryodhana-vadhaḥ sampatsyate, tasyāḥ prāg yadā
GK19gp23-33u:3620: grasta-sūryeṇa tamasā tamasā vyāpi tad dinam |
GK19gp23-33u:3623: kaṃsa-pratāpitāḥ sarve vayaṃ yātā diśaṃ diśam |
GK19gp23-33u:3624: etarhy eva punaḥ sthānaṃ daivenāsāditāḥ svasaḥ ||JGc_1,33.76|| iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3631: [179] kiṃ bahunā, bhavān api tatra bhavitā |
GK19gp23-33u:3633: yataḥ parimilanāya parasparam adhikam abhikatāṃ gatānāṃ lakṣya-mātraṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3639: viṣārditaṃ vārbhavatā vilokyate saṅgāt tathā tvad-virahī tvayā vrajaḥ ||JGc_1,33.77||
GK19gp23-33u:3643: dāsā hṛdyās tava nija-janāḥ kecid anye ca tatra |
GK19gp23-33u:3644: prāpsyanti tvāṃ bhavati ca bhaviṣyanti te' nanya-cittās
GK19gp23-33u:3645: teṣv āveśād bahuṣu bhavitā naika-cetā bhavāṃs tu ||JGc_1,33.78||
GK19gp23-33u:3647: tvaṃ vrajeti nija-prema gopayann iva vatsyasi |
GK19gp23-33u:3648: vrajas tu sva-guṇais tatra sarva-preyān bhaviṣyati ||JGc_1,33.79||
GK19gp23-33u:3650: yadā yadā drakṣyati tāṃ bhavāṃs tadā pūrṇaṃ samūrṇo lavitā dṛśor jalam |
GK19gp23-33u:3651: bhavantam apy evam amī yathāmunā kaṇṭhāntam antar hṛdayaṃ nirotsyate ||JGc_1,33.80||
GK19gp23-33u:3652: [184] tad evaṃ vaiśākham ārabhya varṣā yāvad atiharṣāt tvāṃ nirṇimeṣam eva nirvarṇayantas te vraja-vāsinaḥ saṃvatsyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3658_1: mantraṇā-pūrvakaṃ vicintya niścintya ca śrīman-nandādīn sa-sāntvaṃ māthurān eva prasthāpayiṣyasi |
GK19gp23-33u:3659: [185] idam eva bādarāyaṇir apy āha tataḥ kāmaiḥ pūryamāṇaḥ sa-vrajaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3663: prasthāpana-samayatas teṣāṃ viśeṣāvasthā-varṇanaṃ tu tat tad asmākaṃ buddhim āstṛṇotīty alam ativistareṇa |
GK19gp23-33u:3665: [187] ṛṣir uvāca-kuru-sthalāt kuśasthalam āgatya sthitaḥ sa bhavān pāṇḍava-rājena rājasūya-mantraṇāyāsmad-dvārā nimantritaṃ sann indraprasthaṃ prasthāsyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3666: [188] tataś ca satvaraṃ gatvā bhīa-prabhṛtaye dik-sīma-vijaya-yaśāṃsi
GK19gp23-33u:3667: dattvā bhīma-dvārā jarāsandhaṃ hatvā tat-kṛta-bandhāni nṛpa-vṛndāni
GK19gp23-33u:3668: mocayitvā vijitena rāja-vrajena yudhiṣṭhiraṃ rocayitvā rājasūyena
GK19gp23-33u:3671: bandhaṃ bandhaṃ yam anu mumuce taṃ jarāsandham enaṃ hanyām addhā svayam atha yadi śravyam etan na tarhi |
GK19gp23-33u:3672: itthaṃ kṛṣṇa tvam iha kalayan bhīmasenena yuddhād dharyād daitya-prakṛtim amukaṃ ghātayiṣyasy asy upetya ||JGc_1,33.81||
GK19gp23-33u:3677: nirjitya kṣitipati-maṇḍalāni pāṇḍoḥ putrais tāny anugamitāni saṅghaṭayya |
GK19gp23-33u:3681: svargasthāḥ svarga-pālās tridaśa-munivarāḥ kiṃ ca vedhāḥ śivāś ca |
GK19gp23-33u:3682: dṛṣṭyā śrutyāpi tat tad bahuvidha-bhagavad-rūpa-vṛndasya vijñāḥ paśyanto rūpam etat tava kim api muhur vismariṣyanti sarvam
GK19gp23-33u:3683: [191] tad evaṃ rājasūyaṃ santānya kuntyāḥ santānān sammānya yadā dvārakāyāṃ gantāsi, tadā sādhūnāṃ śalyaṃ śālvaṃ lohamaya-vyoma-cāri-pūryā
GK19gp23-33u:3684: parāg eva tām āvārya dṛṣṭvā pūryamāṇa-pāñcajanyaḥ sannāti-prayatnatas taṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3691: yāvan na danti-dantānām antaḥ patati tat-phalam ||JGc_1,33.86||
GK19gp23-33u:3694: [195] tad etat procya maharṣiṇā manasi procyate sma-eṣā ca kalilokair viralair evāvakalayiṣyate
GK19gp23-33u:3695: asyā hi bahirmukhān pratavaguṇṭhayitum antarmukhāṃs tūtkaṇṭhayituṃ maharṣibhiḥ parokṣa-prāyī-kṛtāyāḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3701: campū-dvayam apūrva-racanayā sampūrṇaṃ kurvadbhyām uttara-campūttara-bhāgam añcadbhyāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3703: [196] yadā śālva-yuddham udbuddham, tadā pāṇḍavānāṃ durodara-daṇḍa iti
GK19gp23-33u:3708: tad-anantaraṃ ca punar vrajāgamanam asya mahādeva-devyāḥ saṃvāda-rahasya-maye tatraiva spaṣṭaṃ niṣṭaṅkyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3709: yat khalu satya-saṅkalpatayānalpa-samajñā-vijñātānāṃ āyāsye iti dyotakaiḥ [BhP 10.41.17], āgamiṣyaty atidīrgheṇa [BhP 10.46.34] ity
GK19gp23-33u:3712: na kevalaṃ pratijñā-mātraṃ tatra pratīti-pātrīkṛtam, kintu
GK19gp23-33u:3714: [197] tathā hi prathame dvārakā-prajā-vacane-yarhy ambujākṣāpasasāra bho bhavān kurūn madhūn vātha suhṛd-didṛkṣayā [BhP 1.11.9] iti pratyakṣaṃ lakṣyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3716: kurukṣetra-yātrāyāṃ hi sphuṭam asya vacanaṃ tasya tat-kālatām eva racayati |
GK19gp23-33u:3718: api smaratha naḥ sakhyaḥ svānām artha-cikīrṣayā |
GK19gp23-33u:3720: [198] vidūrathāntaśatruvadham evāvavadhim atra karoti nānyad iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3721: tad evaṃ sthite tad-anantaraṃ ca labdhāntaratayā tenānena teṣāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3725: api naḥ svagatiṃ sūkṣmām [BhP 10.28.12] iti, na veda svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman [BhP
GK19gp23-33u:3726: 10.28.14] iti, gopānāṃ svaṃ lokaṃ [BhP 10.28.15] iti, kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra
GK19gp23-33u:3729: vatsair vatsatarībhiś ca sarāmo bālakair vṛtaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3732: anyatra gamanena vaikuṇṭha iva śrī-vrajendra-nandanasya mathurādi-gamanena
GK19gp23-33u:3738: atiduḥkhaṃ duṣpratīpaṃ tad golokaṃ sa-śarma ca ||JGc_1,33.88||
GK19gp23-33u:3740: sāṅgaṃ yāvad vaibhavaṃ ca vrajaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vrajiṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3741: sa-kṛṣṇam anukṛṣṇaṃ yo dhāsyate ca sa-rāmakam
GK19gp23-33u:3744: [200] tad evaṃ vimṛṣya tu śrī-devarṣiḥ spaṣṭam ācaṣṭa- [201] yadā tvaṃ rājasūyataḥ sukhaṃ sambhūya svālaya-calanārambhaṃ sambhāvayiṣyasi, tadā
GK19gp23-33u:3745: vakrabhāva-cakrataḥ śakram api jigīṣur dantavakras tvāṃ kevalaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3746: sarva-caṅkramaṇa-cakravalaṃ vitarkayan balena balena ca vinābhūtena tvayā
GK19gp23-33u:3747: kevalena gadāyuddham adhvany anivicchan madhupurīm āgantum urīkariṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3748: tām āgatya ca gatyantaraṃ cintayan man-mukhatas tava
GK19gp23-33u:3749: dvārakā-saṃmukha-prasthānaṃ śālva-saṃsthāpanaṃ cāsthāya sadyas tvāṃ praty eva duḥsthātmatayā prasthāsyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3750: [202] tadaiva ca mano-juti-vibhūti-mayena mayā kathanayā nija-vraja-gamanāya tad evāspadam āspadaṃ kurval-labdha-manorathas
GK19gp23-33u:3751: tādṛśa-divya-rathaś ca tvaṃ tat-kṣaṇam eva mathurā-pura-dvāri
GK19gp23-33u:3752: prāpta-gati-prathas taṃ gadāvantaṃ niṣkrāmantaṃ drakṣyasi, srakṣyasi ca tvāṃ prati krāmantaṃ taṃ prati gadāṃ srakṣyante ca, pratyastrāṇīva
GK19gp23-33u:3753: tvad-ābhimukhyena karūṣa-mukhyena tena caidyenaiva sātma-jyotiṣkā niṣkāsya prāṇāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3757: jitvā rājyaṃ māthuraṃ sādhayiṣyāmy evaṃ naṅkṣaty eṣa ko dantavakraḥ ||JGc_1,33.91||
GK19gp23-33u:3760: vidūrathaś ca bhavitā dūrataḥ krūra-kīṭavat ||JGc_1,33.92||[204] tad evaṃ dantavakraṃ vidūratham api vidūratas tadā gadā-cakra-ghātaṃ ghātayitvā
GK19gp23-33u:3762: astuṅkāraḥ śrīmad-vraja-virājamāna-rāja-kumāraḥ svaka-vraja-kulam eva bhavān mathurā-bhavān anuyokṣyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3765: kālam iva cālayituṃ punar api sudināyamānatāṃ pratipālayituṃ samprati yamunā-pārīṇaṃ jātam ity avakalayyānukāmīnena nija-divya-vimānena
GK19gp23-33u:3766: samuttīrya diviṣadbhiḥ kusumair avakīryamāṇaḥ sahasā tad-vāsaṃ cāsat tu mud yokṣyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3767: [205] uttīrṇe ca tvayi sarvataḥ kīrṇena ninitāśeṣeṇa
GK19gp23-33u:3768: ratha-ghargharita-viśeṣeṇa tvad-āgamanam eva manvānās tvat-parimala-valanena tu niścinvānāḥ sarva-vidhā eva tvad-ekādhvānataḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3769: pradhāvanam eva tanvānāḥ śrīman-nandādy-abhidhānāḥ sannidhānaṃ vināpi śikhaṇḍi-maṇḍalavad amī mārtaṇḍa-maṇḍala-stha-megha-khaṇḍam iva
GK19gp23-33u:3773: spandanam apy avindamānāḥ syandanād dūratas tad-avasthā eva sthāsyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3774: [207] tvaṃ punaḥ sahasā rathād avatīrya teṣāṃ pathā yathā-vīryaṃ dhāvan
GK19gp23-33u:3776: asambhāvita-samānaḥ param āsaktyā sarvān api tān anarvācīna-śaktyā ca pṛthak pṛthag eva ca yugapad eva ca saṅgacchan samāliṅgaṃs tat tad
GK19gp23-33u:3777: aṅga-saṅgataṃ svāṅgam apii na tato bhinnam aṅgīkariṣyasi |
GK19gp23-33u:3778: [208] te ca tathā śokāpanudaṃ datta-mudaṃ tvāṃ labhamānāḥ sarve janyavas
GK19gp23-33u:3781: yadā yātaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ punar api yadūnāṃ nagaratas tadā gopāḥ so' pi prati-nijam adhur moda-nivaham
GK19gp23-33u:3782: vyatiśliṣṭā yarhi pratijanam idaṃ nājani manāg ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kim aham iti tarhi sphuṭataram
GK19gp23-33u:3787: tadvad goṣṭha-sthitānāṃ tava viraha-rujāṃ hanta te saṅga-sāraḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3789: pūrvam avyaktībhāvam āpannā madhumaṅgala-pūrṇābhyarṇā paurṇamāsī sa-vṛndā
GK19gp23-33u:3790: vṛndā ca samam apracchannatāṃ gacchantī tu sukha-saṃmūrcchanān mūrcchām iva gatābhyas tābhyaḥ sābhyasūyam iva kramād bahir vṛttiṃ yacchantī
GK19gp23-33u:3793: kṛṣṇaṃ madhya-gataṃ vidhāya pitarau tad-bhrātaraḥ strī-gaṇās
GK19gp23-33u:3795: muñcantaḥ sphuṭam aśru tasya sukhadaṃ cārūpa-cāraṃ ciraṃ vismṛtya sthagita-kriyāḥ samabhavan mūkāś ca vaisvaryataḥ ||JGc_1,33.95||
GK19gp23-33u:3796: [212] tvaṃ tu tatra strī-kumāraṃ putra-pautraṃ kubja-vāmanaṃ dāsī-dāsam
GK19gp23-33u:3798: [213] dārukas tu dāruvad eva dūrasthitas tat-prema-vaśyatayā kautukam iva drakṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3799: [214] tataś ca tatrāsīnā paurṇamāsī kupitevālapiṣyati-ahaha kim idam avidanta iva kurvantaḥ stha ? pathi pariśrāntam imaṃ katham iva na
GK19gp23-33u:3805: [216] tataś ca te sarve bhavat-paricaryā-maya-parisaryākṛtaḥ sambharamam
GK19gp23-33u:3809: yarhy āgantāsy aghahara cirād dvārakātas tadā te
GK19gp23-33u:3812: kurvanto' pi sthagita-kṛtitām eva yāsyanti hanta ||JGc_1,33.97||
GK19gp23-33u:3813: yadyapi gopāḥ samyak paricarituṃ tvāṃ na tarhi śakṣyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3814: tad api na tat-pramadāmṛta-bhogās tvāmī sadaiva pokṣyanti ||JGc_1,33.98||
GK19gp23-33u:3816: kiṃ bhoktavyaṃ kvāsitavyaṃ svapanīyaṃ kva vāmunā |
GK19gp23-33u:3819: smariṣyanti tu tāṃ tvat-kāṃ punaḥ saṃśleṣa-navyatām ||JGc_1,33.99||dāsāś
GK19gp23-33u:3820: ca tava dāśārha punar āśāṃ sva-mūrtiṣu |
GK19gp23-33u:3823: tadvad eva sadaivāmūr dhāsyanti pramadaṃ tvayi ||JGc_1,33.101||śiśavaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3824: paśavaś caiva vayāṃsi ca payāṃsi ca |
GK19gp23-33u:3825: ye' nye hṛdyā janā hṛdyās tava teṣāṃ tu kā kathā ||JGc_1,33.102||
GK19gp23-33u:3826: [218] kūrmasyeva smaraṇānubhāvena tava tena tvadīyāḥ pūrvavad eva hi te
GK19gp23-33u:3828: tathaiva vrajād baladevaḥ kuśasthalīm āsādya tvayi nivedayiṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3832: upaviṣṭaṃ tadā rāmaṃ papraccha kuśalaṃ vraje |
GK19gp23-33u:3833: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu goṣu caiva janārdanaḥ ||
GK19gp23-33u:3835: sarveṣāṃ kuśalaṃ kṛṣṇa yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi ||[HV 83.53,55-6] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3836: [219] tad evaṃ sthite' pi tadā tava sadā vrajāvasthiti-pratītis tu teṣāṃ nātijaniṣyate
GK19gp23-33u:3837: syandanaṃ tad atra tad-avastham eva sthāpitam astīty
GK19gp23-33u:3839: [220] kiṃ ca, tava savayasaḥ pravayasaḥ pratīdaṃ pratīpam āvedayiṣyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3842: janitānurāga-janatāsu tāsu prāg iva nānurāgaṃ jāgaram āgamayati |
GK19gp23-33u:3843: tāś ca tathā dṛṣṭvā lagita-duḥkha-sthagitatayā śuṣkā iva tiṣṭhanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3846: [222] tvaṃ tu jantu-mātra-citta-jñas tad vijñāya svayam eva tān vijñāpayiṣyasi-kathaṃ bhavanto nādyāpy ānandād udbhavanto dṛśyante |
GK19gp23-33u:3849: [224] atha tvaṃ vakṣyasi-bāḍhaṃ kintu yena bhavadbhiḥ sandihyate, so' yaṃ śatāṅgaḥ sāṅga-bhavat-kārya-saṅgamanāya saṅge rakṣitatayā lakṣyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3851: etad eva prāg eva niveditaṃ mayā-
GK19gp23-33u:3852: yāta yūyaṃ vrajaṃ tāta vayaṃ ca sneha-duḥkhitān |
GK19gp23-33u:3853: jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham ||[BhP 10.45.23] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3854: [225] jñātīn iti yuṣman-madhyata evāsau vāsaḥ sambhaviṣyati, draṣṭum iti tatra ca yuṣmad-darśanam evāsmākaṃ puruṣārtha ity arthaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3855: yad vā draṣṭum iti darśana-viṣayī-bhavitum ity arthaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3856: athāpi bhūman mahimā guṇasya te viboddhum arhaty amalāntarātmabhiḥ [BhP 10.14.6] ity atra bodha-viṣayī-bhavitum itivad etad uddhavena ca bhavatsu samudbuddhaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3859: priyaṃ vidhāsyate pitror bhagavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ ||
GK19gp23-33u:3861: yad āha vaḥ samāgatya kṛṣṇaḥ satyaṃ karoti tat ||[BhP 10.46.34-5] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3862: [226] sātvatāṃ patir api pūrṇa-ṣaḍaiśvarya-sampattir api pitror yuvayor
GK19gp23-33u:3863: vrajeśitroḥ parama-sukha-śriyaṃ sadā svalālanā-rūpaṃ priyaṃ vidhāsyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3864: tatrāpy acyuta evāvasthāsyate, yatas tat tato hetor adyāpi satyaṃ śapathaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3865: karoti, kurvann eva vartata ity arthaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3866: tad anenaiva nayena bhavatāṃ praṇayarṇaṃ vinayeya, na tu manāg api gamanāgastvena |
GK19gp23-33u:3869: duḥkhāt kaṃsa-vināśanārtham agamaṃ śīghrāṃ nivṛttiṃ vidan |
GK19gp23-33u:3870: tatrāsīt suhṛdāṃ manoratha-tatir yuddhāyatir durhṛdāṃ caivaṃ tad-vyasanaṃ samāpya yadi ca prāgāṃ kva vā yāmy aham ||JGc_1,33.103|| iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3871: [227] tataḥ śrī-vrajeśvarānumatyā pratyāsannāḥ sarve' pi prārthayiṣyante |
GK19gp23-33u:3872: evaṃ ced iha ca tava dvārakā-vad eva bahala-gṛha-bṛṃhaṇāya spṛhayāmaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3873: anyathā-karaṇaṃ tu yad asmākam adhanyatāṃ vahatīti |
GK19gp23-33u:3874: [228] tad etad ākarṇya bhūmiṃ nirvarṇya tvaṃ tu tasminn asantuṣṭa iva cetasi cintayitāsi-gṛha-śabdaḥ khalv ebhir gṛhiṇī-paryāyatayā
GK19gp23-33u:3876: tatra ca hanta mama svāntaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vāmī vidhāsyantīti |
GK19gp23-33u:3877: [229] atha punar vibhāvayitāsi-bhavatu, pūrṇa-jñāna-tūrṇa-vidhānā ca paurṇamāsy atra sarvaṃ śarma nirmāsyati, na tv anyathākarmatāṃ dhāsyatīti
GK19gp23-33u:3879: tarhi rohiṇī-mātā rauhiṇeya-bhrātā ca dvārakāgārād ākāraṇīyau |
GK19gp23-33u:3881: [230] atha punar dāruka-sārathiṃ prati prathayiṣyasi-bho sārathe !
GK19gp23-33u:3882: sarathaḥ prathamānayātyantīnatayā bhavān yadu-bhavanam āsādya sadyaḥ śrīmad-bhrātaraṃ tan-mātaraṃ ca prāpayeti |
GK19gp23-33u:3885: [231] tatas tad-vandanāruke dāruke pavanam anuharamāṇena yānena
GK19gp23-33u:3886: muhūrta-mātrārdhatais taiḥ sārdham āgate tasmin vismita-manasaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3887: śrīman-nandādayaḥ paramānandāśayatayā sahasā bhavad-āgamanavad eva sahasā mahasā todyamānātodya-vrajaṃ tan-nijālayam āneṣyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3888: [232] gateṣu ca dineṣu tri-catureṣu rāmādayas te vrajasthābhir ucitam eva tubhyaṃ rocayiṣyanti-
GK19gp23-33u:3889: yeṣāṃ prema-guṇair yas tvaṃ baddhaḥ suṣṭhutayā hariḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3890: tasya tair viniruddhā ye kuryus te katham anyathā ||JGc_1,33.104||
GK19gp23-33u:3891: [233] sarve ca militvā nirṇeṣyanti mānyāḥ kanyā-vicāram |
GK19gp23-33u:3892: kātyāyanyārādhikās tāḥ kanyā dhanyādayaḥ sanyāyatām arhantīti |
GK19gp23-33u:3893: [234] rāmoddhavau tu parama-niṣṇātau kṛṣṇavaj jñātvā tūṣṇīm
GK19gp23-33u:3896: pūrṇa-mano-gatī pūrṇimābhyarṇam āsādya sadyas tasyāṃ varivasyā-pūrvakaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3898: [236] sāpi vakṣyati-tad api bhadram eva, kintu varyāḥ parama-varyā
GK19gp23-33u:3900: [237] tau tu sa-vailakṣyaṃ vakṣyataḥ-kāḥ khalu rādhikādy-abhidhāḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:3904: sā tu sa-hāsaṃ vakṣyati-yathā kātyāyany-ārādhikānāṃ kanyātvam evam anyāsāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3909: sā vakṣyati-bhavantaḥ khalv idaṃ nānubhavanta iva santi |
GK19gp23-33u:3910: yat punar adyāpi kanyā eva tā dhanyāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3915: kiṃ tad idaṃ kiñcana bhavantāv anu
GK19gp23-33u:3917: tās tad ekānuraktā mādṛśa-sāntvanayā param adyāvadhi dhairya-sampṛktāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3920: tāsāṃ tad idaṃ na kevalam aham eva vidaty asmi, kintu sarvāpi vraja-janatā |
GK19gp23-33u:3921: tac ca pūrvam api kiñcit kiñcid viśeṣtas tu kṛṣṇa-kṛta-vṛṣṇi-sthāna-prasthāna-gata-tad-anavasthāvasthāyām
GK19gp23-33u:3923: [238] tatra pūrvaṃ yathā-kuja-gatiṃ gamitā na vidāmaḥ; kaśmalena kavaraṃ vasanaṃ vā [BhP 10.35.17] ity ādinā |
GK19gp23-33u:3924: uttaraṃ tu, nivārayāmaḥ samupetya mādhavaṃ; kiṃ no ækariṣyan kula-vṛddha-bāndhavāḥ [BhP 10.39.28] ity uktvā,
GK19gp23-33u:3925: visṛjya lajjāṃ ruruduḥ sma su-svaraṃ; govinda dāmodara mādhaveti [BhP
GK19gp23-33u:3926: 10.39.31] ity ādinā, kṛṣṇa-dūte samāyāte uddhave tyakta-laukikāḥ [BhP
GK19gp23-33u:3928: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhrātṝn patīn putrān svasṝn api |
GK19gp23-33u:3929: yad-arthe jahima dāśārha dustyajān sva-janān prabho ||[BhP 10.65.11] ity
GK19gp23-33u:3931: yā dustyajaṃ svajanam ārya-pathaṃ ca hitvā ity ādinā ca |
GK19gp23-33u:3932: [239] atra patīn putrān iti yad uktaṃ, tat khalu gauṇīm eva vṛttim anukramya, na tu mukhyām iti bhavat-praśnānukrameṇa prakhyāsāmi |
GK19gp23-33u:3933: tatra yady anyathā manyadhve, tary evam ācakṣmahe-narakādānīta-guru-kumāratayā
GK19gp23-33u:3934: jita-dharmarāja-dhāmā rājad-aghajin-nāmā so' yam etad anurakta-jano' py adharmasya kalayāpi spraṣṭuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca na śakyata eva |
GK19gp23-33u:3936: lajjā-mātraṃ tasya tasya ca maryādā-paryāpakam iti vastutas tu na kevalaṃ rāgata eva tās tādṛśīṃ gati-mārgatāḥ kintv anādi-siddha-svabhāvatayā
GK19gp23-33u:3938: tad etad balarāmoddhavau ca suṣṭhu jānīta iti tāv api praṣṭavyau, anyathā tāsu tat-sandeśa-haratā tayor na deśa-rūpatām āsīdet |
GK19gp23-33u:3939: [240] punas tau vakṣyataḥ-vatsaḥ kim idam anusandadhāti ?
GK19gp23-33u:3940: sā vakṣyati-sa ca pūrvaṃ kiñcid anusaṃhitavān āsīt |
GK19gp23-33u:3943: tau vakṣyataḥ-tāsāṃ tad-artha-prāṇa-jihāsāṃ kim asau jānāti?
GK19gp23-33u:3944: sā vakṣyati-uktam eva samyag vidann āsta iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3945: [241] yataḥ pūrvam apy uddhave tathā samudbuddhaṃ kṛtavān, yathā ca tad-vacanaṃ satya-vacasaś ca gāsyanti-
GK19gp23-33u:3946: gacchoddhava vrajaṃ saumya pitror nau prītim āvaha |
GK19gp23-33u:3949: mām eva dayitaṃ preṣṭham ātmānaṃ manasā gatāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3950: ye tyakta-loka-dharmāś ca mad-arthe tān bibharmy aham ||
GK19gp23-33u:3951: mayi tāḥ preyasāṃ preṣṭhe dūra-sthe gokula-striyaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3955: [242] atra mat-sandeśaiḥ iti mayy āveśya manaḥ kṛṣṇe vimuktāśeṣa-vṛtti yat anusmarantyo māṃ nityam acirān mām upaiṣyatha [BhP 10.47.36] iti paryavasānair ity arthaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3956: mām eva dayitam iti, me vallavyaḥ ity atra tu viśeṣo' py asti, tasmāt tad eka-vrata-jīvana-vratānāṃ tad-bhāryāṇāṃ nānyā gatir nyāyyā |
GK19gp23-33u:3960: loka-dharma-ghaṭanānarha-pratikāre' pi tāsāṃ vighaṭana-duḥkhe yad adyāpi snuṣākaraṇa-spṛhā nāpayāti, pratyuta sātatyata eva tāsu snuṣābhānaṃ vibhāti |
GK19gp23-33u:3965: [245] atha tau spaṣṭaṃ vakṣyataḥ-rahasyam idaṃ lokāḥ kathaṃ maṃsyante |
GK19gp23-33u:3966: sā vakṣyati-māyāyāḥ svabhāva-vyāpitir iyam avyabhicāritayā lakṣyate, yad avaśyam āyatyāṃ vidita-rahasyatām āyātīti |
GK19gp23-33u:3969: [246] yataḥ sarveṣām api sat-saṅkalpānām upari prabhavator bhavator
GK19gp23-33u:3970: nigūḍhā yā tad-artham utkaṇṭhā, sā hy adhunā parāṃ koṭim ārūḍhā jhaṭiti
GK19gp23-33u:3972: tau vakṣyataḥ-svīyām ananya-sambandhitāṃ tāḥ kathaṃ vidanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3973: [247] sā vakṣyati-pūrvaṃ sa vo hi svāmī bhavati iti durvāsaso vacanenāpi samyaṅ nāviduḥ kintu paścād viduḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3976: ataevoktam-api bata madhu-puryām ārya-putro ædhunāste [BhP 10.47.21] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3977: [250] tau vakṣyataḥ-tāsāṃ śvaśuraṃ-manyādīnāṃ ye' nugatās te prāyeṇānutāpaṃ prāpsyanti
GK19gp23-33u:3978: [251] atha sā tu puruṣam iva vakṣyati-tat kim āsāṃ parama-sādhvīnāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3984: vastutas tu teṣām api na sukha-bhaṅga-prasaṅgaḥ yad-dhāmārtha-suhṛt-priyātma-tanaya-prāṇāśayās
GK19gp23-33u:3987: vacana-marmābhir ācaraṇīyam, yathā sarva-sukha-sacanam eva syāt |
GK19gp23-33u:3988: [252] tad etan nirūpya sā punaḥ sahāsaṃ vakṣyati-sāmprataṃ pratataṃ kutukāntaraṃ bhavadvyāṃ kila nāvakalitam |
GK19gp23-33u:3990: ānanda-dyūte tāsāṃ patiṃmanyāṃst tat-pitrādi-paryantaṃ sarvaṃ jitavān |
GK19gp23-33u:3991: lajjām eva sajjan na tad-gṛham ānītavān iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3992: [253] tad idaṃ guptam api kṛtam ādi-varāha-nāmā bhagavān api sva-purāṇe
GK19gp23-33u:3998: [254] tau vakṣyataḥ-tat-pitrādīnāṃ tan-mitrādīnāṃ vā ko vyavasāyaḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:3999: [255] sā vakṣyati-te' pi mayopadiṣṭaṃ tattvīkṛtya pṛṣṭa-kṛtyās tad idam uddiṣṭavantaḥ-
GK19gp23-33u:4000: aho para-sparśa-subhīru yad vapur yat kṛṣṇasāra-praṇayaika-śarma ca |
GK19gp23-33u:4001: tāsāṃ mṛgīṇām iva tat-paraṃ prati praditsavo vyādha-manāṃsi bibhrati ||JGc_1,33.105||
GK19gp23-33u:4003: [257] sā vakṣyati-mat-pṛṣṭābhis tābhir apy evam ādiṣṭam-
GK19gp23-33u:4004: yathā sītā-devyā daśa-mukha-kṛtārtir vipad abhūd yathā vā rukmiṇyā vivahana-vidhiś cedipa-kṛte
GK19gp23-33u:4005: tathā rādhādīnāṃ para-gṛha-gatir yā bata vipat
GK19gp23-33u:4006: kathaṃ tasyā nityā sthitir abhimatā hanta suhṛdām ||JGc_1,33.106|| [*9]
GK19gp23-33u:4007: [*9] This verse is repeated in Uttara-campū, 31.43.
GK19gp23-33u:4008: [258] tau vakṣyataḥ-atha rādhikādīnām ārtānāṃ kā vārtā ?
GK19gp23-33u:4010: deyam adhīnaṃ kārtsnyenābhivyāptyā ca tatra kṛṣṇe svam |
GK19gp23-33u:4013: [261] sā vakṣyati-atha kim ? yatas tāsāṃ marma-prakaṭana-karmaṭhatayā mayā
GK19gp23-33u:4020: [262] tarhi kathaṃ tāsām apy anyāsām iva patitayā
GK19gp23-33u:4022: [263] tad etad ākarṇya pāṭala-paṭala-savarṇa-varṇinyas tā vara-varṇinyas
GK19gp23-33u:4024: [264] hanta ! tāsām eva savirodhas tad-avarodhaḥ sambhavatā-dṛtīyamānā
GK19gp23-33u:4025: dvitīya-pati-bhāvanā ca, na punar anyasyāḥ kasyāścid api |
GK19gp23-33u:4027: sā vā kathaṃ prema-prathana-mayī syād iti na
GK19gp23-33u:4029: [265] asmākam yadyapy asau pārśva-gato raho-gatas tathāpi tasyāṅghri-yugaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:4030: navaṃ navam [BhP 1.11.34] ity eva bodha-viṣayo bhavati |
GK19gp23-33u:4034: mānitāḥ sarve' py asmābhir na mato dharmas tu kenāpi ||JGc_1,33.108||
GK19gp23-33u:4035: [266] yad asmākaṃ bālyād eva tasmin nija-rmaṇatā-bhāvanāṃ dūrīkartum āgraham urīkurvanti, tasmād asmān mā sneha-peṣaṃ piṇḍhi, kintu svābhīṣṭam eva viśaṇḍhi |

GK19gp23-33u:4295_1: sampannaḥ snigdha-saṃvāda-vicchedataḥ parikhidya śanair eva ca vicchidya sva-sva-varmānuvartate
GK19gp23-33u:4295_2: sma śrīmad-vrajendra-nandanas tu tat-kathā-paryantānandena paryāptaḥ sarvaṃ tad-duḥkha-jātam
GK19gp23-33u:4296: tatra bhagavantaḥ śrī-devarṣi-caraṇā yad-yad-bhāvitayā samudbhāvitavantas tat sarvam abhūd eva |
GK19gp23-33u:4300: dāruka-kathita-tat-tad-vṛttābhoga-bhoga-pīnānāṃ svalpa-kālatām āpakam āyādhīnānāṃ tad-āgamanāśayā bahir evāsīnānāṃ tad-iṣṭa-siddhir
GK19gp23-33u:4302: [337] tad evam ākarṇya sarve' pi sabhāsadaḥ procuḥ- tatas tataḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:4303: [338] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tataś ca sarva-sukhārāmābhyāṃ śrī-rohiṇīm ābhyāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:4304: gopocita-veṣādy-abhiniveśa-labdha-sakhi-gaṇa-praveśoddhavenoddhavena ca sārdham asminn eva goloka-nāmake parama-duravaloke loke
GK19gp23-33u:4305: parama-vibhavavatāṃ bhavatāṃ madhye vibhavann eva so' yaṃ virājate |
GK19gp23-33u:4306: [339] punaḥ sarve' py ūcuḥ- tatas tataḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:4307: [340] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tataś ca sarvataḥ prasarad-amanda-bhavad-ānanda-kallola-lolan-manastayā vayam apy āgamya
GK19gp23-33u:4311: [342] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-pūrvaṃ tāvad asmadīyānāṃ duṣprārabdha-vaśād adya śvaś cicaliṣa-yātrāsu yātrāyāṃ vilambanam āsīt |
GK19gp23-33u:4313: śrīmad-vraja-prāṇasya yaduṣu saṅkramaṇam avakarṇya prāṇa-viyojanam ivāsīt
GK19gp23-33u:4314: | cirāya tu vraje tat-prati-saṅkramaṇaṃ cākarṇya sadyaś calitum udyame
GK19gp23-33u:4317: dayā-varṣi-devarṣi-caraṇācarita-nideśam upaniṣat-kṛtya jīvikākṛtya ca śrī-vṛndāvanāgamanaṃ jātam |
GK19gp23-33u:4319: kṛṣṇa-rūpya-krīḍāspadatayā nirūpya mūrcchānantaraṃ jāgaram ṛcchatām asmākam akasmād atrānupraveśaḥ kathaṃ jāta iti na yathātathyaṃ prathayituṃ śakyate sma |
GK19gp23-33u:4323: śrī-gopāla-pūrva-campūṃ sampūrṇayantas tad idaṃ sudināham āsīdāmeti kiṃvānyat kathanīyam
GK19gp23-33u:4324: [345] tad etad uktvā samāpanam idaṃ padyaṃ nigadya paṇāyati sma-
GK19gp23-33u:4325: so' yaṃ gopendra putras tava mahita-mahīyaḥsu śaśvan-mahīyyas
GK19gp23-33u:4328: dūraṃ dhāma prabhāvaṃ vibhavam api mahā-prema-mādhuryam atra
GK19gp23-33u:4329: [346] tad etad uktvā bhrātaraṃ praty uvāca-
GK19gp23-33u:4330: gopāla-yaśasā spṛṣṭaṃ yan mṛṣṭaṃ sūta-janma ca |
GK19gp23-33u:4331: tat tu sparśa-maṇer jātaṃ jāta-rūpa-mayo' pi naḥ ||JGc_1,33.123||
GK19gp23-33u:4334: sādhye śrī-harir eṣa rāma-sahitaḥ pratyakṣatām āgataḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:4335: tatrāpi sva-kathā-prathāṃ kathayituṃ naḥ samyag ādiṣṭavān kāruṇyaṃ kim athāsya varṇyam asakṛt puṇyaṃ ca kiṃ naḥ sakhe ||JGc_1,33.124||
GK19gp23-33u:4339: atigambhīra-kampa-sampat-sampatana-sāmpratatayā lumpan patann iva punaś ca nirnimiṣatā-nirmita-suparvatām ātmani parvan pūrvāvasthām avasthāpayann iva samanantaraṃ ca
GK19gp23-33u:4345: hastau santata-sevanaṃ hṛdayam apy utkaṇṭhayā dhāraṇam |
GK19gp23-33u:4347: preṣṭhānāṃ sthiti-vīkṣaṇaṃ ca bhajatāṃ nau naiva tat-tad-bahiḥ
GK19gp23-33u:4348_0: [348] tad evaṃ labdha-bhakti-prapañcaṃ taṃ ca taṃ ca kuñcan-manasaṃ bhūyo bhūya āhūya
GK19gp23-33u:4348_1: pramada-vraja-virājamānaḥ śrīmān vrajarājaḥ sabhājana-bhājanatayā nija-samīpam āpayāmāsa,
GK19gp23-33u:4349: tena ca sarvam api samājaṃ śarmaṇā bhrājayāmāsa |
GK19gp23-33u:4354: etāny anyaiḥ samarpya dvayam abhihitavān śrīla-goloka-rājaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:4356: asya mātrā tathā mātā tadvat pitrā mayā pitā ||JGc_1,33.127||
GK19gp23-33u:4358: yathā bata sadaḥ-sadastad avagāhya bāhyaṃ gṛham |
GK19gp23-33u:4360: sthalaṃ kila kṛta-kriyaṃ vyasṛjad ātma-labdhān janān ||JGc_1,33.128||
GK19gp23-33u:4361: [349] tad evaṃ kathā-sātau datta-sātau madhukaṇṭha-snigdhakaṇṭhau sadaiva
GK19gp23-33u:4364: [350] atra pūrvam āpātataḥ sudurbodhatāśaṅkayā yadyapi na varṇitās tathāpy asyāṃ śrī-goloka-kṛta-prabhāyāṃ sabhāyāṃ śānta-veśatayā purodhasāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:4365: madhya-sambadhyamānāsanaḥ sukhākṛta-sarva-svajanaḥ sarveṣām agraṇyaḥ śrīmān parjanyaḥ parjanya iva sarva-sukhaṃ varṣann āsīt |
GK19gp23-33u:4366: varīyasī varīyasī cāntaḥ-sabhāyāṃ tathā labdha-prabhā samavartata |
GK19gp23-33u:4367: śrīmān uddhavaś ca sarveṣām uddhava evājanīti sarva-janīnaṃ sukhaṃ kiyad varṇanīyam ?
GK19gp23-33u:4369: vṛndāraṇyābhidhāne sarasi sarasija-śreṇi-lakṣmīṣu gopīṣv ekā rādhābhidhā sā vibhavati satataḥ divya-saugandhika-śrīḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:4370: bhrāmyan yām eva labdhuṃ vrajapati-tanayaś cāvarmūr vartama-vṛttīḥ
GK19gp23-33u:4371: sarvā nirmāya yasyām alir iva kalayā kelim uccais tanoti ||JGc_1,33.129||
GK19gp23-33u:4375: jātaṃ yarhi tadākhilaṃ vilikhitā gopāla-campūr iyam |
GK19gp23-33u:4376: vṛndā-kānanam āśritena laghunā jīvena kenāpi tad vṛndā-kānanam eva sambhṛti-kalāṃ dhattāṃ samantād iha ||2||
GK19gp23-33u:4377: prāyaḥ sarvā harer līlāḥ kramaśaḥ sūcitā mayā |
